DOC.brief_summary: BACKGROUND : A new effective way , transvaginal ultrasound-guided ovarian interstitial laser-coagulation treatment , management anovulation patient polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) , present data publish . But , optimal number laser coagulation point ovarian interstitial applied procedure unclear . This clinic trial aim explore optimal laser dose new protocol . METHODS : Fifty-six PCOS woman clomifene citrate-resistant underwent ultrasound-guided transvaginal ovarian interstitial YAG-laser treatment . By random list table，all subject randomly divide four group term number laser coagulation point make ovary follow : group A , one coagulation point per ovary ; group B , two point ; group C , three point ; group D , four five point . The size point 10 mm diameter ovarian plane monitor transvaginal ultrasound . Postoperative ovulation rate , pregnancy rate biochemical parameter compare among four group .
DOC.brief_title: Ovarian Laser Treatment Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome : A Randomized Study Laser Dose
DOC.detailed_description: Materials method Subject selection Fifty-six patient anovulatory infertility due PCOS include study January 2005 December 2007 . All woman present oligo-/amenorrhea anovulation least 2 year seek pregnancy . The mean ( ± SD ) age 29.1 ± 3.1 year mean duration infertility 3.3 ± 2.0 year . The mean body mass index ( BMI ) 22.9 ± 3.5 kg/m2 . All subject polycystic ovary transvaginal ultrasound scan ( TVS ) ( Aloka-1000 , UST-985 , 5 MHz transvaginal probe , Aloka Co. Ltd , Tokyo , Japan ) , diagnosis PCOS make accord criterion The Rotterdam ( The Rotterdam ESHRE/ASRM-Sponsored PCOS Consensus Workshop Group , 2003 ) . Serum concentration FSH ( 5.4±2.3 IU/L ) , LH ( 11.8±3.2IU/L ) T ( 3.79±1.54nmol/L ) assess third day progesterone-induced bleeding ( natural progesterone injection ; Guangzhou Minxing pharmaceutical company , Guang-Zhou , China ) . TVS examination reveal bilateral ovarian enlargement 10-30 subcapsular follicle 2-8 mm diameter unilateral ovary stromal hypertrophy . All case receive incremental clomifene citrate ( CC ) dose ( 50 , 100 , 150mg ) , fail respond . A normal hysterosalpingography laparoscopy record past three year prior ovarian interstitial laser treatment . Any contraindication surgery , previous treatment LOD presence tubal male factor infertility consider exclusion criterion . The study approve Ethics Committee Shen-Zhen Maternity Child Healthcare Hospital Institutional Review Board Shen-Zhen Bureau Science Technology China . Subjects sign informed consent form . Protocol Study design This prospective , randomize study . Fifty-six subject meeting enrol criterion randomly divide four group A、B、C、D accord computer-generated random list . Randomization occur patient agree inclusion study ( Figure 1 ) . After randomization , woman allocate group intervene laser dosage ovarian interstitial laser treatment . For group A、B、C、D , number laser coagulation point make ovary follow : group A , one coagulation point per ovary ; group B , two point ; group C , three point ; group D , four five point . To point , size laser coagulation zone 10 mm diameter ( light spot diameter 10 mm ovarian plane monitor transvaginal ultrasound ) . Techniques ovarian interstitial laser treatment The procedure transvaginal ultrasound-guided ovarian interstitial laser treatment detail previous data ( Zhu et al. , 2006 ) . All participant treat third day progesterone-induced menstruation period . An intramuscular injection 50-100mg Pethidine ( Pethidine Hydrochloride Injection , Shenyang First Pharmaceutical , NEPG , Shen-Yang , China ) administer woman 30 minute start operation . After empty bladder , woman place lithotomy . They prepare use aseptic vulva vaginal douche . TVS perform wide ovarian plane find . Usually , one three intraovarian point predetermine wide ovarian plane , word , one three laser coagulation point accomplish wide ovarian plane . If , next large ovarian plane choose next option three five laser coagulation point make unilateral ovary . For treatment point , fibre optic cable 400 um diameter send intraovarian point mean 17-gauge , 35-cm-long needle ( K-OPS-1035-Cook IVF ; Brisbane , Australia ) electrical laser ( XH-YAG-100 Laser ; Wuhan Xinghua Photoelectricity Co. Ltd , Wu-Han , China ) activate persistently two five minute power 3-5 W current 8-10 A , 10-mm light spot appear ovarian plane . In group A , one laser treatment point make per ovary ; group B , two point ; group C , three point ; group D , four five point . The woman stay bed two three hour surgery , re-examined TVS order rule intra-abdominal haemorrhage prior discharge . Postoperative Monitoring Serum hormone concentration At second , fourth sixth month operation , blood sample take day three menstrual cycle measurement serum level LH , FSH , testosterone , prolactin ( PRL ) , estradiol ( E2 ) progesterone woman regular ovulation menstrual cycle . If , blood sample take day three progesterone-induced withdrawal bleeding . Another blood sample take day 21 cycle order measure serum concentration progesterone ovulation could diagnose TVS . Follicle development ovulation Follicular growth ovulation monitor monthly TVS four five day interval operation . The scan repeat two three day lead follicle reach diameter 12 mm . When dominant follicle reach diameter 16 mm . LH surge detect urinalysis . Combined result TVS , ovulation time sexual intercourse could confirm . If ovulation interval six postoperative month within range 21-35 day , woman document responder regular ovulation . If spontaneous ovulation menstruation occur six postoperative month , woman categorize nonresponder . The woman whose status would categorize irregular ovulation . Pregnancy miscarriage A urine pregnancy test perform spontaneous menstruation occur 16-19 day follow ovulation . The pregnancy rate calculate base woman conceive . Miscarriage would consider , gestational sac without cardiac action previous cardiac action stop , although urine pregnancy test positive . Adverse effect Adverse effect , include intra-abdominal haemorrhage , infection , injuries internal organ failure ovarian function , record . Analysis data Women divide four group accord number laser coagulation point make ovarian interstitial follow : group A ( n=14 ) treat one laser coagulation point per ovary , group B ( n=14 ) two point , group C ( n=14 ) three point , group D ( n=14 ) four five point . The mean ± SD baseline postoperative second , fourth sixth month value among four group calculate serum LH , FSH , testosterone , PRL , progesterone , E2 level . Analysis variance use statistical analysis . The ovulation rate pregnancy rate calculate base case postoperative spontaneous ovulation pregnancy . Contingency table analysis use compare success rate , P < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: 1. anovulatory woman clomifene citrate ( CC ) resistant polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) 2 . A normal hysterosalpingography laparoscopy record 3. infertility 1 . Any contraindication surgery 2. previous treatment LOD 3. presence tubal male factor infertility
